it.sevenbits.telenote.core.mappers

Interface NoteMapper


  • public interface NoteMapper
    Mapper for note operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFirstNote(Note note)
      Adds first note with text, uuid, parent_user_id specified in note.
      void addNote(Note note)
      Adds note with text, uuid, parent_user_id specified in note.
      void deleteNote(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Deletes note by note id.
      void duplicateNote(Note note)
      Adds a clone of a specified note with new note id.
      java.util.List<UserDetailsImpl> findShareUsers(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets list of users, with which note shared.
      java.util.List<Note> findUserNotes(java.lang.Long userId)
      Gets list of notes in a descending order owned by user with user id.
      java.util.List<NoteModel> getAllSharedNoteModels(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets note models(note id, owner username, owner email) of notes with specified uuid.
      java.lang.Long getNoteIdByUserIdParentId(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.Long parentNoteId)
      Gets id of a note with specified field parent_note_id owned by user with userId.
      java.util.List<NoteModel> getNotesWithSameNoteUuidByUserId(java.lang.Long userId)
      Gets list of notes that contains notes owned by user and notes, which uuid is the same with one of own notes.
      java.util.List<Note> getNotesWithSameUuidById(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets list of notes with same uuid as it is in note with specified note id.
      java.util.List<UserDetailsImpl> getUsersWithSameNoteUuid(java.lang.String noteUuid)
      Gets list of users which have note with specified uuid.
      UserDetailsImpl getUserWhoOwnsNote(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets user who owns note with specified note id.
      UserDetailsImpl getUserWhoSharedNote(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets user who shared note with specified note id.
      java.lang.String getUuidById(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets field uuid of note with specified note id.
      int isNoteAlreadyShared(UserNote userNote)
      Checks is note already shared to user. with user id specified in userNote by counting records in usernotes with the same uuid as in note with note id specified in userNote.
      int isNoteBelongsToUser(java.lang.Long noteId, java.lang.Long userId)
      Checks is note belongs to user by counting pairs user id - note id.
      java.lang.Long isParentNoteIdExists(java.lang.Long noteId)
      Gets field parent_note_id of note with specified note id.
      void linkUserWithNote(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.Long noteId)
      Adds a record user id - note id in usernotes table.
      void resetAllParentNoteUserId(java.lang.Long parentNoteId)
      Resets db field parent_note_id to null, changes db field parent_user_id to user id who owns note.
      void updateFirstElementOrder(OrderData orderData)
      Updates field note_order of note that is first in the list.
      void updateNote(Note note)
      Updates note fields updated_at to update time, parent_note_id to specified in note by note id.
      void updateNotesByUuid(Note note)
      Updates fields note, updated_at of note with specified uuid.
      void updateOrder(OrderData orderData)
      Updates field note_order of note that is between the other two.
      void updateUuidByIds(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> notesId, java.lang.String uuid)
      Updates field uuid of notes which specified by notesId list.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteNote

        void deleteNote(java.lang.Long noteId)
        Deletes note by note id.
        Parameters:
        noteId - note id.

      • resetAllParentNoteUserId

        void resetAllParentNoteUserId(java.lang.Long parentNoteId)
        Resets db field parent_note_id to null, changes db field parent_user_id to user id who owns note. Do this for all notes with parent_note_id field equals parentNoteId.
        Parameters:
        parentNoteId - id of a note, which created other note by sharing.

      • updateNote

        void updateNote(Note note)
        Updates note fields updated_at to update time, parent_note_id to specified in note by note id.
        Parameters:
        note - POJO that contains note data.

      • findUserNotes

        java.util.List<Note> findUserNotes(java.lang.Long userId)
        Gets list of notes in a descending order owned by user with user id.
        Parameters:
        userId - user id.
        Returns:
        list of notes in a descending order owned by user with user id

      • isNoteBelongsToUser

        int isNoteBelongsToUser(java.lang.Long noteId,
                        java.lang.Long userId)
        Checks is note belongs to user by counting pairs user id - note id.
        Parameters:
        noteId - note id.
        userId - user id.
        Returns:
        count of pairs user id - note id.

        Returns:
        field parent_note_id of note with specified note id.

      • getUuidById

        java.lang.String getUuidById(java.lang.Long noteId)
        Gets field uuid of note with specified note id.
        Parameters:
        noteId - note id.
        Returns:
        field uuid of note with specified note id.

      • updateNotesByUuid

        void updateNotesByUuid(Note note)
        Updates fields note, updated_at of note with specified uuid.
        Parameters:
        note - POJO that contains note data.

      • isNoteAlreadyShared

        int isNoteAlreadyShared(UserNote userNote)
        Checks is note already shared to user. with user id specified in userNote by counting records in usernotes with the same uuid as in note with note id specified in userNote. User id fixes user. Note id fixes uuid of a note.
        Parameters:
        userNote - POJO that contains pair user id - note id.
        Returns:
        count of records user id - note id.

      • updateOrder

        void updateOrder(OrderData orderData)
        Updates field note_order of note that is between the other two. New value is (previous note_order + next note_order) / 2.
        Parameters:
        orderData - POJO for ordering notes.

      • updateFirstElementOrder

        void updateFirstElementOrder(OrderData orderData)
        Updates field note_order of note that is first in the list. New value is (next note_order + 1).
        Parameters:
        orderData - POJO for ordering notes.

      • getNotesWithSameUuidById

        java.util.List<Note> getNotesWithSameUuidById(java.lang.Long noteId)
        Gets list of notes with same uuid as it is in note with specified note id.
        Parameters:
        noteId - note id.
        Returns:
        list of notes with same uuid as it is in note with specified note id.

      • getUsersWithSameNoteUuid

        java.util.List<UserDetailsImpl> getUsersWithSameNoteUuid(java.lang.String noteUuid)
        Gets list of users which have note with specified uuid.
        Parameters:
        noteUuid - uuid of a note.
        Returns:
        list of users which have note with specified uuid.

      • updateUuidByIds

        void updateUuidByIds(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> notesId,
                     java.lang.String uuid)
        Updates field uuid of notes which specified by notesId list.
        Parameters:
        notesId - list of note ids to be updated.
        uuid - uuid to update with.

        Parameters:
        userId - user id.
        Returns:
        list of notes that contains notes owned by user and notes, which uuid is the same with one of own notes.
